name: Happy little accidents: lessons from 3 games and 2 MUD versions
description: We'll chat about the history of MUD, all the things that went wrong in previous iterations of the engine, games we built with it, and the lessons we learned from it.

speakers.name: Alvarius
speakers.bio: Alvarius is co-founder and CTO of Lattice. Working on MUD, among other things. Previously built OPCraft.

speakers.name: Biscaryn
speakers.bio: Biscaryn heads strategy and operations at Lattice and helped organize the first ever Autonomous Worlds Residency in 2022. Outside of his main role, he also composed the soundtrack for the unreleased Ember (Lattice's first game) and oversaw the art, music, and sounds for OPCraft.
